classes.name: Artificer
classes.interests: Robots, Replacing Your Limbs with Robot Arms, Metal Pets, Making Magical Items
classes.description: Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects.

classes.name: Barbarian
classes.interests: RAAAAGE!!!, Bodypaint, Going Straight to Combat, Saying 'The Wound is No Big Deal'
classes.description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage

classes.name: Bard
classes.interests: Beating the Big Bad With a Lute Solo, Singing Limericks, Seducing the Dragon
classes.description: An inspiring magician whose power echoes the music of creation

classes.name: Cleric
classes.interests: Holy Symbols, Dramatic Prayers, Wrecking Undead, Being the Designated Healer
classes.description: A priestly champion who wields divine magic in service of a higher power

classes.name: Druid
classes.interests: Cuddling with Animals, Turning into a Freaking Bear, Controlled Wildfires, Wood Armor
classes.description: A priest of the Old Faith, wielding the powers of nature and adopting animal forms

classes.name: Fighter
classes.interests: Dealing the Most Damage, Mastery of all Weapons, Kicking Down Doors, Short Rests
classes.description: A master of martial combat, skilled with a variety of weapons and armor

classes.name: Monk
classes.interests: Running Across Water, Running Up Walls, Rock Hard Abs, Punching People to Death
classes.description: A master of martial arts, harnessing the power of the body in pursuit of physical and spiritual perfection

classes.name: Paladin
classes.interests: Holy Auras, Ride-or-Die for Your God, Full Plate Armor, Smiting Baddies
classes.description: A holy warrior bound to a sacred oath

classes.name: Ranger
classes.interests: Pets, Animals, Bows, Long Walks in the Forest, Overcoming Prejudice
classes.description: A warrior who combats threats on the edges of civilization

classes.name: Rogue
classes.interests: Stealing, Sneaking, Stabbing from Behind, Stealing More Stuff, Obscuring Cloaks, Shadows
classes.description: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies

classes.name: Sorcerer
classes.interests: Dragons, Making Fun of Wizards, Two Spells at Once!, Sneaky Spells
classes.description: A spellcaster who draws on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

classes.name: Warlock
classes.interests: Demons, Work-Smarter-Not-Harder, Edgy Leather, Evil Fairies, Cthulhu
classes.description: A wielder of magic that is derived from a bargain with an extraplanar entity

classes.name: Wizard
classes.interests: Reading, Harry Potter, Being Smarter Than Everyone Else, Beards, Fireball
classes.description: A scholarly magic-user capable of manipulating the structures of reality
